mean_height + qt(0.975, df = n() - 1) * sd(height, na.rm = TRUE) / sqrt(n())\n  )\n\n# Generate the plot\nggplot(summary_data, aes(x = event, y = mean_height)) +\n  geom_line(color = \"blue\", size =
